English:
I just got a job in EDEN! Today's my first day.
I'm really nervous!
Chinese:
終於得到了夢想中在EDEN的工作！
之後就要去報到了。呼～好緊張喔！
Korean:
바라던 EDEN에서의 취직이 결정되었어!
이제부터 첫 출근이야, 후~ 긴장된다!
German:
Ich habe einen Job in EDEN bekommen! Ich fange
heute an. Ich bin so aufgeregt!

English:
You're looking for a friend? I haven't seen anyone
around here. Have you tried another area?
Chinese:
你是在找朋友嗎？
我沒有在這附近看到過……
會不會是在別的區域呢？
Korean:
친구를 찾고 있는 거야?
이 주위에서는 못 봤는데….
다른 에어리어에 있는 거 아니려나?
German:
Du suchst jemanden? Ich habe hier niemanden
gesehen. Hast du es schon woanders probiert?

English:
If there's nothing else, I'd better be on my way.
Come on, relax!
Chinese:
如果沒事的話，我就先離開了！
呼～！　放輕鬆、放輕鬆！
Korean:
용무가 없다면 실례할게!
후~! 릴랙스, 릴랙스!
German:
Wenn du sonst nichts hast, sollte ich lieber
gehen. Also gut, tief durchatmen.
